title: WTB - Card Box For Mini Top Loaders
author: I Only Smoke 4 the Cards

posts.post_title: WTB - Card Box For Mini Top Loaders
posts.post_content: I keep my t206 in mini loaders and woukd like to get a nice box for them.

Hi Alex,
I bought a Pelican Case model 1170 on ebay for about $35.00 which included shipping. I think its great for protection and it holds over 400 of the t206 mini holders with 4 rows..With the price you could buy more t206 cards. 

I included some pics. Sorry for the bad lighting

Joe
